mapper.insert: insert into trainmeg_keep(id, department_trainmeg, conType, principal, account) value (#{id}, #{depTrainMeg}, #{conType}, #{principal}, #{account})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from trainmeg_keep
and department_trainmeg like #{department}"%" and department_trainmeg like "%"#{name}"%" and principal like CONCAT('%', #{principal}, '%') and conType = #{conType}
select department_trainmeg as depTrainMeg from trainmeg_keep where department_trainmeg = #{depTrainMeg};
